Convo_0.A1: Hello Bob, I'd like to ask you a few questions if you don't mind
Convo_0.A2: Hello Bob, I'm cosidering the fact that you might be a suspect. I need to ask you some questions you must comply
Convo_0.A11: Can you tell me what happened here?
Convo_0.A12: Can you tell me what you saw?
Convo_0.A21: You will need to travel to the police station with me.
Convo_0.A22: Can you tell me what happened here?
Convo_0.A23: Can you tell me what you saw?
Convo_0.A111: You think you saw a man run out, with his hoodie up?
Convo_0.A112: Do you think you can ID this man?
Convo_0.A113: Did the man do anything out of the ordinary?
Convo_0.A114: Can you identify the man or the scream?
Convo_0.A121: Do you think you can identify the object which was thrown out?
Convo_0.A122: Do you think you can ID the man that ran out?
Convo_0.A132: I think I will need to bring you in for further questioning
Convo_0.A133: Alright, can you tell me what happened here?
Convo_0.A134: I don't now if I should believe you.. You're the only one out here after all
Convo_0.A211: I forgot what your rights are. So you are coming with me anyways
Convo_0.A212: Are you going to resist arrest?!
Convo_0.A214: I was joking about all that.
Convo_0.A221: Anything else you want to add to that?
Convo_0.A222: Anything ELSE you want to add to that?
Convo_0.A223: Anything else you WANT to add to that?
Convo_0.A231: Have you ever seen that person before?
Convo_0.A232: Did you see what object it was?
Convo_0.A233: Riiiiight... You see or hear anything else?
Convo_0.A234: Are you high? Are you seeing things?
Convo_0.A1113: Thank you for your statement I will go check out the garbage can right now.
